Enchanter : créature (Ciblez une créature au moment où vous jouez cette carte. Cette carte arrive en jeu attachée à cette créature.)
À chaque fois que la créature enchantée attaque ou bloque, son contrôleur perd 3 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Mes malédictions préférées sont celles qui se manifestent lentement, ternissant l'âme sans que la victime parvienne à le comprendre. » —Erissa, sorcière des marécages

foreignNames.name: Legame Contaminato
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura (Bersaglia una creatura mentre giochi questa carta. Questa carta entra in gioco assegnata a quella creatura.)
Ogniqualvolta la creatura incantata attacca o blocca, il suo controllore perde 3 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "Le mie maledizioni preferite sono quelle che si manifestano lentamente, offuscando l'anima in un modo che la vittima non può nemmeno sperare di comprendere." —Erissa, fattucchiera della palude

foreignNames.name: 汚染された結合
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー） （これをプレイする際に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。 このカードはそのクリーチャーにつけられている状態で場に出る。）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーが攻撃やブロックするたび、それのコントローラーは３点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: ゆっくりと魂を汚していって、何が起こっているかそいつにすら理解できないって呪いがお気に入りだね。 ――沼の魔女、エリッサ

foreignNames.name: Elo Contaminado
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura (Ao jogar este card, escolha uma criatura alvo. Este card entra em jogo anexado àquela criatura.)
Toda vez que a criatura encantada ataca ou bloqueia, o seu controlador perde 3 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Minhas maldições favoritas são as que se manifestam lentamente, enegrecendo a alma de modos que a vítima não pode esperar compreender." — Erissa, bruxa do pântano

foreignNames.name: Зараженные Оковы
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо (При разыгрывании этой карты выберите целью существо. Эта карта входит в игру прикрепленной к тому существу.)
Каждый раз, когда зачарованное существо атакует или блокирует, контролирующий его игрок теряет 3 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: "Мои любимые проклятия действуют медленно, очерняя душу жертвы самыми необъяснимыми путями". — Эрисса, болотная ведьма

foreignNames.name: 污化羁绊
foreignNames.text:
生物结界（于使用时指定一个生物为目标。 此牌进场时结附在该生物上。）
每当受此结界的生物进行攻击或阻挡时，此生物的操控者失去3点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我最爱的诅咒是慢慢生效，并以受诅心灵无法理解的方式逐渐污化之。」 ～腐沼女巫伊黎莎

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.

cards.name: Contaminated Bond
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"My favorite curses are those that manifest slowly, blackening the soul in ways the victim cannot hope to understand."
—Erissa, bog witch

cards.name: Cruel Edict
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor:
"Choose your next words carefully. They will be your last."
—Phage the Untouchable

foreignNames.name: Grausames Edikt
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl opfert eine Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wähle deine nächsten Worte sorgfältig. Es werden deine letzten sein." —Phage die Unberührbare

foreignNames.name: Edicto cruel
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo sacrifica una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Elige con cuidado tus próximas palabras. Serán las últimas." —Phage la Intocable

foreignNames.name: Édit cruel
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé sacrifie une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Choisissez bien vos prochaines paroles. Ce seront les dernières. » —Phage l'Intouchable

foreignNames.name: Editto Crudele
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio sacrifica una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Scegli le tue prossime parole con molta attenzione. Perché saranno le ultime." —Phage l'Intoccabile

foreignNames.name: 残酷な布告
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: 次にいう言葉は慎重に選びなよ。 お前の最期の言葉なんだから。 ――触れられざる者フェイジ

foreignNames.name: Édito Cruel
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo sacrifica uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Escolha bem suas próximas palavras. Serão suas últimas." — Phage, a Intocável

foreignNames.name: Жестокий Указ
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент жертвует существо.
foreignNames.flavor: "Хорошенько подумайте над тем, что вы сейчас скажете. Это будут ваши последние слова". — Фейдж Неприкасаемая

foreignNames.name: 残酷勒令
foreignNames.text: 目标对手牺牲一个生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「下一句话好好想过再说。 那会是你的遗言。」 ～不可近的菲姬

cards.originalText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Deathmark
cards.text: Destroy target green or white creature.
cards.flavor:
"I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body."
—Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

foreignNames.name: Todeszeichen
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine grüne oder weiße Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich hoffe, es stimmt, dass jede Schneeflocke einzigartig ist, da ich nie wieder etwas wie das hier sehen will. Und jetzt räum die Leiche weg." —Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoranische Patrouille

foreignNames.name: Marca mortal
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo verde o blanca.
foreignNames.flavor: "Espero que sea cierto que cada copo de nieve es único, porque no quiero volver a ver uno así nunca más. Ahora limpien ese cuerpo." —Thangbrand Gyrdsson, patrulla kjeldorana

foreignNames.name: Mortemarque
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature verte ou blanche ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: « J'espère qu'il est vrai que chaque flocon de neige est unique, parce que je ne veux plus jamais en voir un pareil. Nettoyez-moi ce cadavre. » —Thangbrand Gyrdsson, patrouilleur kjeldorien

foreignNames.name: Marchiare a Morte
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura verde o bianca bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Spero che sia vero che ogni fiocco di neve è unico, perché non voglio mai più vederne un altro come questo. Adesso togliete quel cadavere." —Thangbrand Gyrdsson, pattuglia di Kjeldor

foreignNames.name: 死の印
foreignNames.text: 緑か白のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 雪の結晶に同じものが無いってのが本当なのを願うね。これと同じ物なんかもう見たくもないよ。 さあ、遺体を片付けよう。 ――キイェルドーの巡回兵、タングブランド・ゲルドソン

foreignNames.name: Mancha da Morte
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo verde ou branca.
foreignNames.flavor: "Espero que seja verdade que todo floco de neve é único, porque não quero ver um como esse nunca mais. Agora limpem aquele corpo." — Thangbrand Gyrdsson, patrulheiro kjeldorano

foreignNames.name: Метка Смерти
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое зеленое или белое существо.
foreignNames.flavor: "Надеюсь, правду говорят, будто не бывает двух одинаковых снежинок: я не хотел бы снова увидеть такую же. А теперь уберите труп". — Тангбранд Гирдссон, патрульный Кьельдора

foreignNames.name: 死印
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标绿色或白色生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「据说每片雪花都独一无二；希望这是真的，因为我再也不想看到这样一片。 快把尸体清理掉。」 ～奇亚多巡逻队的桑班·盖德森

cards.originalText: Destroy target green or white creature.

cards.name: Diabolic Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.

foreignNames.name: Teuflischer Lehrmeister
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte und nimm diese Karte auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Die besten Ideen kommen oft aus den verdrehtesten Hirnen.

foreignNames.name: Tutor diabólico
foreignNames.text: Busca una carta de tu biblioteca y pon esa carta en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Las mejores ideas frecuentemente vienen de las peores mentes.

foreignNames.name: Précepteur démoniaque
foreignNames.text: Cherchez une carte dans votre bibliothèque et mettez cette carte dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Les meilleures idées viennent parfois des pires esprits.

foreignNames.name: Tutore Diabolico
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta e aggiungila alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Le idee migliori spesso vengono dalle menti peggiori.

foreignNames.name: 魔性の教示者
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーからカードを１枚探し、そのカードをあなたの手札に加える。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 最高のアイデアは、往々にして最低の心から生まれるんだ。

foreignNames.name: Tutor Diabólico
foreignNames.text: Procure em seu grimório por um card e coloque aquele card em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: As melhores idéias costumam vir das piores mentes.

foreignNames.name: Дьявольский Наставник
foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту и поместите ту карту в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Порою худшие умы порождают гениальнейшие мысли.

foreignNames.name: 恶魔导师
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 最好的点子常常出自最坏的心灵。

cards.originalText: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Distress
cards.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"They say the eyes are the windows to the soul. I like to break windows and take what's inside."
—Braids, dementia summoner

rulings.text: If you target yourself with this spell, you must reveal your entire hand to the other players just as any other player would.

foreignNames.name: Kummer
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst eine Nichtländerkarte darunter. Dieser Spieler wirft diese Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Es heißt, die Augen seien die Fenster der Seele. Ich schlage gerne Fenster ein und hole mir, was dahinter liegt." —Braids, Wahnwitzbeschwörerin

foreignNames.name: Acosar
foreignNames.text: El jugador objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dicen que los ojos son ventanas hacia el alma. Me gusta romper ventanas y tomar lo que hay dentro." —Trenzas, invocadora de demencia

foreignNames.name: Détresse
foreignNames.text: Le joueur ciblé révèle sa main. Choisissez-y une carte non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « On dit que les yeux sont le miroir de l'âme. Autant le briser pour prendre ce qui se trouve derrière. » —Nattes, invocatrice de démences

foreignNames.name: Angoscia
foreignNames.text: Un giocatore bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dicono che gli occhi sono la finestra dell'anima. Mi piace infrangere le finestre per prendere quel che c'è all'interno." —Braids, evocatrice di demenza

foreignNames.name: 困窮
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは手札を公開する。 その中の土地でないカードを１枚選ぶ。 そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 目は心の窓だなんていうわね。 私はその窓をぶち壊して中身を取り出すほうが好きだわ。 ――狂気を招く者ブレイズ

foreignNames.name: Extenuar
foreignNames.text: O jogador alvo revela sua própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dizem que os olhos são as janelas da alma. Eu gosto de quebrar janelas e pegar o que há dentro." — Braids, invocadora da demência

foreignNames.name: Разорение
foreignNames.text: Целевой игрок показывает свою руку. Выберите из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту.
foreignNames.flavor: "Говорят, что глаза это окна души. Мне нравится разбивать окна и разорять дома". — Брейдс, призывающая слабоумие

foreignNames.name: 苦痛
foreignNames.text: 目标牌手展示其手牌。 你选择其中一张非地的牌。 该牌手弃掉该牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「话说眼睛是灵魂之窗。 我倒挺喜欢打破窗子往里瞧。」 ～惧像召唤师布蕾德

cards.originalText: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Doomed Necromancer
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Many necromancers share the same last words—the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.

foreignNames.name: Verdammter Geisterbeschwörer
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, opfere den Verdammten Geisterbeschwörer: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Viele Geisterbeschwörer benutzen die gleichen letzten Worte — die letzten Worte des Rituals, mit dem sie sich selbst zu Untoten machen.

foreignNames.name: Nigromante condenado
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, sacrificar el Nigromante condenado: Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al juego.
foreignNames.flavor: Muchos nigromantes comparten las mismas últimas palabras; las que concluyen el ritual de muerte viviente.

foreignNames.name: Nécromancien condamné
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, sacrifiez le Nécromancien condamné : Renvoyez en jeu la carte de créature ciblée de votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Bon nombre de nécromanciens périssent de la même manière — en prononçant les dernières incantations du rituel de la morte-vie.

foreignNames.name: Negromante Condannato
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifica il Negromante Condannato: Rimetti in gioco una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Molti negromanti condividono le stesse ultime parole: quelle che concludono il rituale della non morte.

foreignNames.name: 宿命のネクロマンサー
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, 宿命のネクロマンサーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを場に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 多くの屍術士が同じ遺言を残す――不死の儀式の終了だ。

foreignNames.name: Necromante Condenado
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifique Necromante Condenado: Devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para o jogo.
foreignNames.flavor: Muitos necromantes compartilham as mesmas últimas palavras as que concluem o ritual dos mortos-vivos.

foreignNames.name: Обреченный Некромант
foreignNames.text: {B}, {T}, Пожертвуйте Обреченного Некроманта: Верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища в игру.
foreignNames.flavor: У многих некромантов одни и те же последние слова это слова, которыми заканчивается ритуал вызова нежити.

foreignNames.name: 败亡死灵术士
foreignNames.text: {B}，{T}，牺牲败亡死灵术士：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。
foreignNames.flavor: 许多死灵术士的遗言是同一句～用来结束亡物仪式的那句。

cards.originalText: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.

cards.name: Dross Crocodile
cards.flavor:
"As soon as it surfaced, we could all smell it. Its rancid breath reeked of half-digested carrion and its own rotting innards."
—Dafri, Auriok champion

foreignNames.name: Schlackenkrokodil
foreignNames.flavor: „Sobald es an die Oberfläche kam, konnten wir es alle riechen. Sein Atem stank nach halb verdautem Aas und seinen eigenen verrottenden Eingeweiden." —Dafri, Auriok-Champion

foreignNames.name: Cocodrilo del Dros
foreignNames.flavor: "Tan pronto como se asomó a la superficie, todos pudimos olerlo. Su aliento rancio apestaba a carroña semi-digerida y a sus propias entrañas pútridas." —Dafri, campeón áuriok

foreignNames.name: Crocodile de Mephidross
foreignNames.flavor: « On le sentit aussitôt qu'il fit surface. Son haleine rance puait la charogne à moitié digérée et ses propres organes en décomposition. » —Dafri, champion auriok

foreignNames.name: Coccodrillo delle Scorie
foreignNames.flavor: "Non appena emerse, potemmo tutti sentirne il fetore. Il suo alito rancido puzzava di carogne in parte digerite e dei suoi visceri in putrefazione." —Dafri, campione Auriok

foreignNames.name: ドロスのクロコダイル
foreignNames.flavor: 浮かんできたら、すぐに臭いでわかる。 その息の臭いといったら、消化しかけの腐肉と自分の腐った内臓からくるんだから。 ――オーリオックの勇者、ダフリ

foreignNames.name: Crocodilo do Entulho
foreignNames.flavor: "Assim que atingiu a superfície, todos pudemos sentir seu cheiro. Seu hálito podre fedia a cadáver mal digerido e as suas próprias vísceras apodrecidas." — Dafri, campeã dos Aurioques

foreignNames.name: Отбросный Крокодил
foreignNames.flavor: "Как только он поднялся на поверхность, мы все почувствовали страшную вонь. В его гнилостном дыхании перемешался смрад полупереваренной падали и его собственных разлагающихся внутренностей". — Дафри, защитник ауриоков

foreignNames.name: 蔓非沼鳄鱼
foreignNames.flavor: 「他才冒出水面，气味就扑鼻而来。 那令人作呕的吐息散发着半消化的腐肉与他自己发臭内脏的味道。」 ～欧瑞克斗士达夫力

cards.name: Drudge Skeletons
cards.text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

foreignNames.name: Heer der geplagten Skelette
foreignNames.text: {B}: Regeneriere das Heer der geplagten Skelette. (Das nächste Mal, dass diese Kreatur in diesem Zug zerstört würde, wird sie nicht zerstört. Tappe sie stattdessen, entferne allen Schaden von ihr und entferne sie aus dem Kampf.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Toten geben gute Soldaten ab. Sie können keine Befehle verweigern, geben nie auf, und hören nicht auf zu kämpfen, wenn mal ein Körperteil abgeschlagen wird." —Nevinyrral, Handbuch für Zauberer

foreignNames.name: Esqueletos esclavos
foreignNames.text: {B}: Regenera a los Esqueletos esclavos. (La próxima vez que esta criatura fuera a ser destruida este turno, no lo es. En vez de eso, gírala, remueve todo el daño de ella y remuévela del combate.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Los muertos son buenos soldados. No pueden desobedecer órdenes, nunca se rinden y no dejan de pelear cuando se les cae una parte del cuerpo." —Nevinyrral, Manual del Nigromante

foreignNames.name: Squelettes serviles
foreignNames.text: {B} : Régénérez les Squelettes serviles. (La prochaine fois que cette créature devrait être détruite ce tour-ci, elle ne l'est pas. À la place, engagez-la, retirez-lui toutes ses blessures et retirez-la du combat.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Les morts font de bons soldats. Ils ne peuvent désobéir, ils ne se rendent pas, et ils ne cessent pas le combat quand un morceau de leur corps vient à tomber. » —Nevinyrral, Le guide du parfait nécromancien

foreignNames.name: Scheletri Maledetti
foreignNames.text: {B}: Rigenera gli Scheletri Maledetti. (La prossima volta che questa creatura sta per essere distrutta in questo turno, non viene distrutta. Invece TAPpala, rimuovi da essa tutto il danno e rimuovila dal combattimento.)
foreignNames.flavor: "I morti sono ottimi soldati. Non disobbediscono agli ordini, non si arrendono mai e non si fermano quando perdono una parte del corpo in battaglia." —Nevinyrral, Manuale del Necromante

foreignNames.name: 蠢く骸骨
foreignNames.text: {B}：蠢く骸骨を再生する。 （このターン、次にこのクリーチャーが破壊される場合、破壊されない。 代わりに、それをタップし、それに与えられているダメージをすべて取り除き、それを戦闘から取り除く。）
foreignNames.flavor: 死者は兵士に絶好である。 命令に逆らうこともなければ、降伏することもありえない。しかも、身体のどこかが取れたぐらいでは戦いをやめないのだから。 ――ネビニラル「ネクロマンサーの手引き」

foreignNames.name: Esqueletos de Carga
foreignNames.text: {B}: Regenere Esqueletos de Carga. (Na próxima vez em que esta criatura seria destruída neste turno, ela não será. Em vez disso, vire-a, remova todo o dano dela e remova-a do combate.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Os mortos dão bons soldados. Não podem desobedecer ordens, jamais se rendem e não param de lutar só por que lhes caiu alguma parte do corpo." — Nevinyrral, Manual do Necromante

foreignNames.name: Неутомимые Скелеты
foreignNames.text: {B}: Регенерируйте Неутомимых Скелетов. (В следующий раз при уничтожении этого существа в этом ходу, оно не уничтожается. Вместо этого поверните его, снимите с него все повреждения и выведите его из боя.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Из мертвых получаются хорошие солдаты. Они не могут не подчиняться приказам, никогда не сдаются, не прекращают сражения, даже если отвалилась какая-то часть тела". — Невиниррал, Справочник некроманта

foreignNames.name: 苦力骷髅妖
foreignNames.text: {B}：重生苦力骷髅妖。 （如果此生物下一次于本回合中将被消灭，则它不会被消灭， 而是改为将它横置，移除受过的所有伤害，并将它移出战斗。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「死者可成为良好的士兵。 它们不会违背命令，它们从不投降，它们也不会因为身上随便哪块部份掉下来就停止战斗。」 ～妮维亚洛，《死灵术士手册》

cards.originalText: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons.

cards.name: Drudge Skeletons
cards.text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

cards.name: Dusk Imp
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

foreignNames.name: Dämmerungsbold
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: Bolde sind gerade noch intelligent genug, um zu verstehen, was Grausamkeit ist.

foreignNames.name: Diablillo del crepúsculo
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: Los diablillos son sólo lo suficientemente inteligentes como para entender la crueldad.

foreignNames.name: Diablotin du crépuscule
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
foreignNames.flavor: Les diablotins ont une intelligence à peine suffisante pour comprendre ce qu'est la cruauté.

foreignNames.name: Demonietto del Crepuscolo
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
foreignNames.flavor: Gli imp hanno un'intelligenza appena sufficiente alla comprensione della crudeltà.

foreignNames.name: 薄暮のインプ
foreignNames.text: 飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: インプには、残酷さというものが理解できる程度の知性はある。

foreignNames.name: Diabrete da Penumbra
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: Os diabretes são inteligentes o quanto basta para saber o que é crueldade.

foreignNames.name: Сумеречный Бес
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
foreignNames.flavor: Бесам хватает ума ровно настолько, чтобы понимать, что такое жестокость.

foreignNames.name: 薄暮小恶魔
foreignNames.text: 飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
foreignNames.flavor: 小恶魔的聪明程度刚好够理解何谓残酷。

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Dusk Imp
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

cards.name: Essence Drain
cards.text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"The elves are right: Death inevitably leads to life. But the truly powerful don't just experience this cycle. They control it."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

rulings.text: If the target permanent or player is an illegal target when Essence Drain tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain 3 life.

foreignNames.name: Essenzentzug
foreignNames.text: Der Essenzentzug fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu, und du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Elfen haben Recht: Aus dem Tod entsteht neues Leben. Aber die Mächtigsten müssen diesen Zyklus nicht durchlaufen. Sie kontrollieren ihn stattdessen." —Crovax, aufsteigender Evincar

foreignNames.name: Drenaje de esencia
foreignNames.text: El Drenaje de esencia hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo y tú ganas 3 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los elfos están en lo cierto: la muerte lleva inevitablemente a la vida. Pero los poderosos no se sientan a experimentar el ciclo. Lo controlan." —Crovax, évincar predominante

foreignNames.name: Drain d'essence
foreignNames.text: Le Drain d'essence inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur, et vous gagnez 3 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les elfes ont raison : la mort conduit inévitablement à la vie. Mais les puissants de ce monde ne sont pas les victimes de ce cycle. Ils le contrôlent. » — Crovax, incarmal

foreignNames.name: Risucchia Essenza
foreignNames.text: Risucchia Essenza infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio e tu guadagni 3 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "Gli elfi hanno ragione: la Morte inevitabilmente porta alla vita. Ma quelli realmente possenti non fanno esperienza di questo ciclo. Piuttosto lo controllano." —Crovax, evincaro dominante

foreignNames.name: 本質の吸収
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。本質の吸収はそれに３点のダメージを与え、あなたは３点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: エルフの言うことは正しい。死は結局生へとつながっていく。 しかし、真の強さはその周期を理解することではない。 それを支配することだ。 ――隆盛なるエヴィンカー、クロウヴァクス

foreignNames.name: Drenar Essência
foreignNames.text: Drenar Essência causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo e você ganha 3 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os elfos estão certos: a morte leva inevitavelmente à vida. Mas os realmente poderosos não experimentam simplesmente este ciclo. Eles o controlam." — Crovax, evincar ascendente

foreignNames.name: Утечка Эссенции
foreignNames.text: Утечка Эссенции наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу или игроку, а вы получаете 3 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: "Эльфы правы: смерть неизбежно ведет к жизни. Но те, кто обладают истинной властью, не проходят через этот цикл пассивно. Они им управляют". — Кровакс, правящий эвинкар

foreignNames.name: 吸取精华
foreignNames.text: 吸取精华对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害，且你获得3点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「地精是对的：死亡必将引领新生。 但真强者不只能体验此循环，还能一手掌控。」 ～天威大魔将寇维克斯

cards.originalText: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Fear
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

foreignNames.name: Furcht
foreignNames.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung (Bestimme eine Kreatur als Ziel, sowie du diese Karte spielst. Diese Karte kommt an die Kreatur angelegt ins Spiel.)
Die verzauberte Kreatur verursacht Furcht. (Sie kann nur von Artefaktkreaturen und/oder schwarzen Kreaturen geblockt werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: „Auch tapfere Kämpfer kennen den Griff der Angst um ihr starkes Herz." —Lim-Dûl, der Geisterbeschwörer

foreignNames.name: Inspirar temor
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura. (Haz objetivo a una criatura al jugarlo. Esta carta entra en juego anexada a esa criatura.)
La criatura encantada tiene la habilidad de inspirar temor. (No puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas artefacto y/o criaturas negras.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Incluso los más bravos guerreros han sentido la fría garra del miedo en sus valientes corazones." —Lim-Dûl el Nigromante

foreignNames.name: Peur
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature (Ciblez une créature au moment où vous jouez cette carte. Cette carte arrive en jeu attachée à cette créature.)
La créature enchantée a la peur. (Elle ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures-artefacts et/ou des créatures noires.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Même le plus brave des guerriers connaît parfois la noire griffe de la frayeur qui enserre son cœur vaillant. » —Lim-Dûl, le Nécromancien

foreignNames.name: Paura
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura (Bersaglia una creatura mentre giochi questa carta. Questa carta entra in gioco assegnata a quella creatura.)
La creatura incantata ha paura. (Non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature artefatto e/o creature nere.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Perfino il più coraggioso tra i guerrieri conosce l'oscura morsa del terrore sul suo cuore impavido." —Lim-Dûl il Necromante

foreignNames.name: 畏怖
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー） （これをプレイする際に、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。 このカードはそのクリーチャーにつけられている状態で場に出る。）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは畏怖を持つ。 （それはアーティファクト・クリーチャーか黒クリーチャー以外にはブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 最も勇敢な戦士でさえも、その逞しき心臓を縮みあがらせんと掴みかかる闇の恐怖を知っておるのだ。 ――屍術師リム＝ドゥール

foreignNames.name: Amedrontar
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura (Ao jogar este card, escolha uma criatura alvo. Este card entra em jogo anexado àquela criatura.)
A criatura encantada tem a habilidade de amedrontar. (Ela só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas artefato e/ou criaturas pretas.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Mesmo o mais valente dos guerreiros conhece a garra sombria do medo em seu vigoroso coração." — Lim-Dûl, o Necromante

foreignNames.name: Страх
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо (При разыгрывании этой карты выберите целью существо. Эта карта входит в игру прикрепленной к тому существу.)
Зачарованное существо имеет Страх. (Оно может быть заблокировано только артефактным существом и/или черным существом.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Даже храбрейшему из воинов знакомо чувство страха, стальными тисками сжимающее его отважное сердце". — Лим-Дул, Некромант

foreignNames.name: 恐惧
foreignNames.text:
生物结界（于使用时指定一个生物为目标。 此牌进场时结附在该生物上。）
受此结界的生物具有恐惧异能。 （此生物只能被神器和／或黑色生物阻挡。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「自己坚决心志被黑暗紧攫的这份惊恐，就算是最勇猛的战士也没尝过。」 ～死灵术士林杜

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has fear.

cards.name: Fear
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"Even the bravest of warriors yet knows the dark clutch of fright upon his stalwart heart."
—Lim-Dûl the Necromancer

cards.name: Festering Goblin
cards.text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

foreignNames.name: Eiternder Goblin
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Eiternde Goblin aus dem Spiel auf den Friedhof gelegt wird, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: In seinem Leben war er ein stinkendes, verseuchtes Ding. Als er tot war, änderte sich daran nicht viel.

foreignNames.name: Trasgo purulento
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Trasgo purulento vaya a un cementerio desde el juego, la criatura objetivo obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: En vida, era una cosa fétida, llena de enfermedades. Una vez muerto, no cambió mucho.

foreignNames.name: Gobelin pourrissant
foreignNames.text: Quand le Gobelin pourrissant est mis dans un cimetière depuis le jeu, la créature ciblée gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Vivant, c'était une chose fétide, rongée par la maladie. La mort n'a pas changé grand chose.

foreignNames.name: Goblin in Putrefazione
foreignNames.text: Quando il Goblin in Putrefazione viene messo in un cimitero dal gioco, una creatura bersaglio prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: In vita era una cosa fetida e piena di malattie. Dopo la morte non è cambiato di molto.

foreignNames.name: ただれたゴブリン
foreignNames.text: ただれたゴブリンが場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－１/－１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 生きてたころ、奴は臭くて病気持ちだった。 死んでからだって、そんなに変わらないよ。

foreignNames.name: Goblin Apodrecido
foreignNames.text: Quando Goblin Apodrecido é colocado num cemitério vindo de jogo, a criatura alvo recebe -1/-1 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Em vida, era uma coisa fétida e doentia. Na morte, não mudou muito.

foreignNames.name: Разлагающийся Гоблин
foreignNames.text: Когда Разлагающийся Гоблин попадает из игры на кладбище, целевое существо получает -1/-1 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Он и при жизни распространял вокруг себя болезни и гнусный запах. После смерти мало что изменилось.

foreignNames.name: 溃伤精灵
foreignNames.text: 当溃伤精灵从场上进入坟墓场时，目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 活着的时候是个活动垃圾堆， 死后也没啥变化。

cards.originalText: When Festering Goblin is put into a graveyard from play, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Grave Pact
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor:
"The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

rulings.text: Each other player sacrifices a creature for each creature you control that goes to a graveyard.

foreignNames.name: Todespakt
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, opfern alle anderen Spieler eine Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ein Treuebund kann einen auch ins Grab bringen." —Crovax, aufsteigender Evincar

foreignNames.name: Pacto de las sepulturas
foreignNames.text: Siempre que una criatura que controles vaya a un cementerio desde el juego, cada uno de los demás jugadores sacrifica una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los lazos de la lealtad pueden atarnos a la tumba." —Crovax, évincar predominante

foreignNames.name: Pacte de la tombe
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature que vous contrôlez est mise dans un cimetière depuis le jeu, chaque autre joueur sacrifie une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les liens de la loyauté peuvent vous attacher à votre tombe. » — Crovax, incarmal

foreignNames.name: Patto Sepolcrale
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura che controlli viene messa in un cimitero dal gioco, ogni altro giocatore sacrifica una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "I legami della lealtà possono incatenarti alla tomba." —Crovax, evincaro dominante

foreignNames.name: 墓穴までの契約
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールするいずれかのクリーチャーが場からいずれかの墓地に置かれるたび、他のプレイヤーはそれぞれクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: 忠誠の絆は、墓穴の中までつながっているのだ。 ――隆盛なるエヴィンカー、クロウヴァクス

foreignNames.name: Pacto da Sepultura
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que uma criatura que você controla é colocada num cemitério vinda de jogo, cada um dos outros jogadores sacrifica uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os laços de lealdade são capazes de atar-te a uma sepultura." — Crovax, evincar ascendente

foreignNames.name: Соглашение о Захоронении
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда существо под вашим контролем попадает из игры на кладбище, все остальные игроки жертвуют по одному существу.
foreignNames.flavor: "Оковы преданности могут сдавить насмерть". — Кровакс, правящий эвинкар

foreignNames.name: 墓约
foreignNames.text: 每当一个由你操控的生物从场上置入坟墓场时，其它每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「忠诚的束缚可以把人绑到坟墓里。」 ～天威大魔将寇维克斯

cards.originalText: Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, each other player sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Graveborn Muse
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
cards.flavor:
"Her voice is damnation, unyielding and certain."
—Phage the Untouchable

foreignNames.name: Muse der Grabgesänge
foreignNames.text: Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments ziehst du X Karten und verlierst X Lebenspunkte, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Zombies ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ihre Stimme ist die der Verdammnis, unnachgiebig und bestimmt." —Phage die Unberührbare

foreignNames.name: Musa nacida de la tumba
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, robas X cartas y pierdes X vidas, donde X es la cantidad de Zombies que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Su voz es condenación, implacable y segura." —Phage la Intocable

foreignNames.name: Muse née des tombes
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, vous piochez X cartes et vous perdez X points de vie, X étant le nombre de zombies que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: « Sa voix est celle de la damnation, certaine et inflexible. » —Phage l'Intouchable

foreignNames.name: Musa Sepolcrogena
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, peschi X carte e perdi X punti vita, dove X è il numero di Zombie che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: "La sua voce è la dannazione, inflessibile e certa." —Phage l'Intoccabile

foreignNames.name: 墓生まれの詩神
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはＸ枚のカードを引き、あなたはＸ点のライフを失う。Ｘはあなたがコントロールするゾンビの総数に等しい。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼女の声は、破滅であり不屈であり確信なのさ。 ――触れられざる者フェイジ

foreignNames.name: Musa Nascida do Túmulo
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, você compra X cards e perde X pontos de vida, sendo X igual ao número de Zumbis que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sua voz é maldição, certa e inflexível." — Phage, a Intocável

foreignNames.name: Муза, Рожденная из Могилы
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки вы берете X карт и теряете X жизней, где X количество Зомби под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ее голос это голос проклятия, непреклонный и уверенный". — Фейдж Неприкасаемая

foreignNames.name: 墓生谬思
foreignNames.text: 在你的维持开始时，你抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为由你操控的灵俑之数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 「她的声音蕴含咒诅，执拗而致命。」 ～不可近的菲姬

cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.

cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

rulings.text: A “creature card” is any card with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact, enchantment, or land. Older cards of type summon are also creature cards.

foreignNames.name: Totengräber
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Totengräber ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückholen.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein voller Sarg ist wie ein voller Koffer — beide sind attraktiv für Diebe.

foreignNames.name: Sepulturero
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Sepulturero entre en juego, puedes regresar la carta objetivo de criatura de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Un ataúd ocupado es como un cofre lleno: ambos atraen a los ladrones.

foreignNames.name: Fossoyeur
foreignNames.text: Quand le Fossoyeur arrive en jeu, vous pouvez renvoyer une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: Un cercueil plein, comme un coffre plein, attire les voleurs.

foreignNames.name: Scavatombe
foreignNames.text: Quando lo Scavatombe entra in gioco, puoi riprendere in mano una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Una tomba piena è come un ricco forziere: entrambi attirano i ladri.

foreignNames.name: グレイブディガー
foreignNames.text: グレイブディガーが場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 副葬品がいっぱいの棺は、中味がいっぱいの貴重品箱と同じだ――どちらも泥棒にとって魅力的だという点で。

foreignNames.name: Coveiro
foreignNames.text: Quando Coveiro entra em jogo, você pode devolver o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para a sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Um caixão cheio é como um cofre cheio ambos são atraentes aos ladrões.

foreignNames.name: Могильщик
foreignNames.text: Когда Могильщик входит в игру, вы можете вернуть целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: Гроб что сундук содержимое и того и другого притягательно для воров.

foreignNames.name: 掘墓怪
foreignNames.text: 当掘墓怪进场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 满载的棺木就像满载的宝库～两者都对贼有吸引力。

cards.originalText: When Gravedigger comes into play, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Lord of the Pit
cards.text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Lord of the Pit. If you can't, Lord of the Pit deals 7 damage to you.

rulings.text: If you control any other creatures as Lord of the Pit’s triggered ability resolves, you must sacrifice one. You can’t choose to be dealt 7 damage instead.

If Lord of the Pit has gained lifelink, being dealt 7 damage by it doesn’t cause your life total to change, even though you gain and lose life. If your life total is less than 7, you won’t lose the game.
If you have two Lords of the Pit, you can sacrifice them to each other.

cards.name: Mortal Combat
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if twenty or more creature cards are in your graveyard, you win the game.
cards.flavor: The crowd roared, the fighters bled, and the dead piled high in the pits. Only the Cabal could win.

rulings.text: If you don’t have twenty or more creature cards in your graveyard by the time your upkeep starts, the ability won’t trigger that turn.

Mortal Combat’s ability has an “intervening ‘if’ clause,” so the condition is checked again when the triggered ability resolves. If you don’t still have twenty creature cards in your graveyard, the ability does nothing.

cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: If you control 0 swamps, then the Nightmare has 0 toughness and will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action right before the next player gains priority.
Nightmare’s power and toughness changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
The ability that defines Nightmare’s power and toughness works everywhere, not just on the battlefield.
Nightmare’s ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.

cards.name: Phage the Untouchable
cards.text:
When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

rulings.text: It is only considered “cast from your hand” if you cast it as a spell from your hand. Putting it onto the battlefield from your hand using a spell or ability will cause you to lose the game.
In a Commander game where this card is your commander, casting it from the Command zone does not count as casting it from your hand.

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
cards.flavor: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger. It doesn’t matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

cards.name: Animate Dead
cards.text:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Animate Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.

rulings.text: Animate Dead is an Aura, albeit with an unusual enchant ability. You target a creature card in a graveyard when you cast it. It enters the battlefield attached to that card. Then it returns that card to the battlefield, and attaches itself to the card again (since the card is a new object on the battlefield). Animate Dead itself never moves into a graveyard during this process.
If Animate Dead isn’t on the battlefield as its triggered ability resolves, none of its effects happen. The creature card won’t be returned to the battlefield.

Abilities such as shroud and protection function only on the battlefield unless otherwise specified. A creature card with shroud may be targeted by Animate Dead, and Animate Dead will become attached to the creature that enters the battlefield.

If the creature put onto the battlefield has protection from black—or if the creature can’t legally be enchanted by Animate Dead for another reason—Animate Dead won’t be able to attach to it. It will be put into the graveyard as a state-based action, causing its delayed triggered ability to trigger. When the trigger resolves, if the creature’s still on the battlefield, its controller will sacrifice it.

Once the creature is returned to the battlefield, Animate Dead can’t be attached to anything other than it (unless Animate Dead somehow manages to put a different creature onto the battlefield). Attempting to move Animate Dead to another creature won’t work.

cards.originalText: Any creature in either player's graveyard comes into play on your side with -1 to its original power. If this enchantment is removed, or at end of game, target creature is returned to its owner's graveyard. Target creature may be killed as normal.

cards.name: Gloom
cards.text:
White spells cost {3} more to cast.
Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

rulings.text: The extra mana is not considered part of the activation cost. It is a separate cost.
The additional mana is paid at the same time the spell/ability is cast/activated.
The extra mana is part of the total cost, so cost reducers can be applied to this cost.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

cards.name: Lich
cards.text:
As Lich enters the battlefield, you lose life equal to your life total.
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
If you would gain life, draw that many cards instead.
Whenever you're dealt damage, sacrifice that many nontoken permanents. If you can't, you lose the game.
When Lich is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose the game.

rulings.text: If an opponent steals control of Lich and no other effect prevents you from losing with a life total of zero, you will lose the game due to a zero life total as a State-Based Action before you can take any actions. The last sentence doesn’t apply in this case since the Lich didn’t leave the battlefield.

If you have multiple Lich cards on the battlefield, you must sacrifice a permanent for each damage done to you for each Lich. This is because the sacrifice is a triggered ability. But you only draw one card for each life gained regardless of how many Liches you have. This is because the draw is a replacement effect and not a triggered one. You lose if any one of the Liches leaves the battlefield.
You can lose life and take damage, and thereby have a negative life total, while Lich is on the battlefield.
If an opponent steals control of Lich, their life total does not change. The life total changes for a player only when it enters the battlefield under that player’s control.
If you take more than one damage at a time, sacrifice the permanents for that damage simultaneously. This allows you to sacrifice both a creature and any Aura that is on it all at once.
You can’t pay life, just like any player at less than one life can’t pay life. You can pay zero life if you want.

The last ability will cause you to lose the game even if you somehow manage to have a life total greater than 0 at the time the Lich leaves the battlefield or if some other effect would prevent you from losing for having 0 life. If, on the other hand, some effect such as that from Platinum Angel says that you can’t lose the game then even the last ability of the Lich cannot cause you to do so. The ability will just resolve and the game will continue as normal.
Note that usually you will have 0 or less life at the time Lich leaves the battlefield causing you to lose as a State-Based Action before the last ability can even go on the stack.

The last ability will cause you to lose the game even if you somehow manage to have a life total greater than 0 at the time the Lich is put into the graveyard or if some other effect would prevent you from losing for having 0 life. If, on the other hand, some effect such as that from Platinum Angel says that you can’t lose the game then even the last ability of the Lich cannot cause you to do so. The ability will just resolve and the game will continue as normal.

cards.originalText: You lose all life. If you gain life later in the game, instead draw one card from your library for each life. For each point of damage you suffer, you must destroy one of your cards in play. Creatures destroyed in this way cannot be regenerated. You lose if this enchantment is destroyed or if you suffer a point of damage without sending a card to the graveyard.
